data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Throw-in for Santos Laguna in their own half.
In the minute 3, Ball goes out of play for a Atlas goal kick.
Santos Laguna to take a throw-in in Atlas territory.
In Torreon Santos Laguna attack through Fernando Gorriaran. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 4, Atlas have a goal kick.
Free kick for Santos Laguna in the half of Atlas.
Throw-in Atlas.
In the minute 7, It's a goal kick for the away team in Torreon.
Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a throw-in for Atlas, close to Santos Laguna's area.
Javier Correa (Atlas) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 9, Goal kick for Santos Laguna at Estadio TSM Corona.
Throw-in for Santos Laguna in the half of Atlas.
Atlas's Luciano Acosta breaks free at Estadio TSM Corona. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 12, Oscar Mejia Garcia awards Santos Laguna a goal kick.
Santos Laguna have been awarded a corner by Oscar Mejia Garcia.
Free kick for Atlas in their own half.
In the minute 15, In Torreon a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Santos Laguna needs to be cautious. Atlas have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Atlas close to the penalty box.
In the minute 16, Corner awarded to Atlas.
Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a free kick to Santos Laguna in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Torreon.
In the minute 19, Santos Laguna awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Atlas have a goal kick.
Santos Laguna have been awarded a corner by Oscar Mejia Garcia.
In the minute 20, Can Santos Laguna get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atlas's half?
Throw-in for Atlas at Estadio TSM Corona.
Atlas awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 22, Oscar Mejia Garcia awards the away team a throw-in.
Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a Santos Laguna throw-in in Atlas's half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 24, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick in a good position for Santos Laguna!
Julio Furch (Santos Laguna) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
In the minute 26, Oscar Mejia Garcia awards Atlas a goal kick.
Santos Laguna to take a throw-in in Atlas territory.
Ball safe as Atlas is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 28, Goal kick for Santos Laguna at Estadio TSM Corona.
Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a free kick to Atlas in their own half.
Ignacio Malcorra gets his shot on target but fails to score for Atlas.
In the minute 30, Corner awarded to Santos Laguna.
Santos Laguna are coming forward and Fernando Gorriaran gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Atlas goal kick.
In the minute 32, Free kick for Atlas in their own half.
In Torreon, Diego Valdes of Santos Laguna is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Atlas awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 35, Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a Atlas throw-in in Santos Laguna's half.
Santos Laguna have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Atlas in their own half.
In the minute 38, Ball safe as Atlas is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a free kick to Atlas in their own half.
Free kick for Santos Laguna in their own half.
In the minute 40, Can Santos Laguna get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atlas's half?
In Torreon, Fernando Gorriaran (Santos Laguna) misses the target with a header.
Ball goes out of play for a Atlas goal kick.
In the minute 42, Atlas's Javier Correa misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Torreon.
At Estadio TSM Corona, Atlas are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 43, Goal kick for Atlas at Estadio TSM Corona.
Free kick Atlas.
Santos Laguna are pushing forward but Eduardo Aguirre's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 45, Oscar Mejia Garcia awards Atlas a goal kick.
Santos Laguna awarded a free kick in their own half.
Oscar Mejia Garcia will wait an extra 3 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
In the minute 45, In Torreon Santos Laguna drive forward through Fernando Gorriaran. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Oscar Mejia Garcia awards the home team a throw-in.
Luciano Acosta for Atlas drives towards goal at Estadio TSM Corona. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 45, Ball goes out of play for a Santos Laguna goal kick.
The first-half is over.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Atlas awarded a free kick in their own half.
Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a free kick to Atlas.
Atlas awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 49, Santos Laguna have a dangerous throw-in.
Atlas's Javier Correa gets in a shot on goal at Estadio TSM Corona. But the effort is unsuccessful.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Torreon.
In the minute 52, Throw-in for Santos Laguna at Estadio TSM Corona.
Throw-in Santos Laguna.
Bryan Garnica is replacing Eduardo Aguirre for Santos Laguna at Estadio TSM Corona.
Atlas awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 53, Jorge Guillermo Almada (Santos Laguna) is making a second substitution, with Walter Sandoval replacing Ulises Rivas.
Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a free kick to Santos Laguna in their own half.
In the minute 54, Free kick Santos Laguna.
Free kick for Santos Laguna in their own half.
Throw-in for Santos Laguna in their own half.
In the minute 58, Corner awarded to Santos Laguna.
Edgar Zaldivar of Atlas gets in a strike, but is off target.
Oscar Mejia Garcia awards Santos Laguna a goal kick.
In the minute 61, In Torreon a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in for Santos Laguna in the half of Atlas.
Atlas have a goal kick.
In the minute 65, Throw-in for Atlas at Estadio TSM Corona.
Can Santos Laguna get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atlas's half?
Santos Laguna to take a throw-in in Atlas territory.
In the minute 66, Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a Santos Laguna throw-in in Atlas's half.
Can Santos Laguna capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Santos Laguna have been awarded a corner by Oscar Mejia Garcia.
In the minute 68, Free kick for Atlas in their own half.
Atlas make their first substitution with Ignacio Jeraldino replacing Javier Correa.
Atlas pushes forward through Ignacio Jeraldino, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 70, Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a free kick to Santos Laguna in their own half.
Throw-in for Atlas in the half of Santos Laguna.
Free kick for Santos Laguna in the half of Atlas.
In the minute 74, Jesus Ocejo is replacing Julio Furch for the home team.
Atlas awarded a free kick in their own half.
The away team replace Jesus Isijara with Brayan Trejo.
In the minute 79, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in high up the field for Atlas in Torreon.
Santos Laguna's Bryan Garnica gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 81, Goal kick for Atlas at Estadio TSM Corona.
Throw-in Atlas.
Santos Laguna awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 83, Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a free kick to Santos Laguna.
Oscar Mejia Garcia awards the away team a throw-in.
Jonathan Herrera is on a sub for Ignacio Malcorra for Atlas.
In the minute 85, Rafael Puente is making the team's fourth substitution at Estadio TSM Corona with Edyairth Ortega replacing Edgar Zaldivar.
Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a Atlas throw-in in Santos Laguna's half.
Oscar Mejia Garcia awards Atlas a goal kick.
In the minute 89, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Santos Laguna close to the penalty box.
Santos Laguna's Diego Valdes is on target but unsuccessful.
Santos Laguna have been awarded a corner by Oscar Mejia Garcia.
Can Santos Laguna capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Atlas's half?
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Can Santos Laguna capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Atlas's half?
Santos Laguna are coming forward and Felix Torres gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Atlas goal kick.
Throw-in for Atlas in the half of Santos Laguna.
Santos Laguna have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Atlas.
Free kick Atlas.
Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a free kick to Santos Laguna in their own half.
It's 0-0 as the referee blows for full-time.
German Conti (Atlas) gets a yellow card.
Bryan Garnica (Santos Laguna) has received a first yellow card.
Brayan Trejo (Atlas) has been shown a straight red card by referee Oscar Mejia Garcia.
